org.agilewiki.jactor2.utilImpl.durable

Class ReadableBytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.utilImpl.durable.ReadableBytes

  • public final class ReadableBytes
extends java.lang.Object

    A readable wrapper for an array of bytes.

    Reads from the wrapped byte array while advancing an internal offset.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected byte[] bytes
      The wrapped immutable array of bytes.
      protected int offset
      A mutable offset into the array of bytes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Create ReadableBytes.
